publicationStmt.p: Published by the William Godwin's Diary project, University of Oxford

div.p: The editors see this as a work in progress and welcome feedback on all aspects of the diary, the search facilities, and the editorial matter on the site. The site will be updated on a regular basis in its first few years to allow the incorporation of continuing research and technical development and information brought to our attention by users. Please contact <godwin.diary@politics.ox.ac.uk>
